Name: Fight in the Arena
About the game: Fight in the Arena is a turn-based fighting game. Since your childhood you wanted to be a fighter. Now, you have finally the chance. A sponsor searches for new fighters in your village and hosts a small tournament. Defeat your opponents in the arena to become The Indomitable, a title not many fighters hold. Key Features In-depth Turn-Based Combat Customize your character 1-2 hour long experience Defeat over 30 opponents
